PackageOracle.name: DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.829562000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dt IN DATE
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dt IN DATE
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,special_request_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dt IN DATE
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,special_request_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_special_request;

body.name: DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.842146000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dt IN DATE
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || actual_completion_dttm || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || requested_completion_dt || '|' || reason_cd || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || dnis_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_special_request a
(
a.special_request_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.actual_completion_dttm
,a.create_dttm
,a.requested_completion_dt
,a.reason_cd
,a.completion_cd
,a.dnis_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.service_address_id
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_special_request_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.actual_completion_dttm
,add.create_dttm
,add.requested_completion_dt
,add.reason_cd
,add.completion_cd
,add.dnis_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.service_address_id
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.special_request_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dt IN DATE
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || actual_completion_dttm || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || requested_completion_dt || '|' || reason_cd || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || dnis_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_special_request a
(
a.special_request_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.actual_completion_dttm
,a.create_dttm
,a.requested_completion_dt
,a.reason_cd
,a.completion_cd
,a.dnis_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.service_address_id
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_special_request_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.actual_completion_dttm
,add.create_dttm
,add.requested_completion_dt
,add.reason_cd
,add.completion_cd
,add.dnis_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.service_address_id
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,special_request_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,actual_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dt IN DATE
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request.add, parms=' || special_request_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || actual_completion_dttm || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || requested_completion_dt || '|' || reason_cd || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || dnis_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_special_request a
(
a.special_request_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.actual_completion_dttm
,a.create_dttm
,a.requested_completion_dt
,a.reason_cd
,a.completion_cd
,a.dnis_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.service_address_id
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.special_request_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.actual_completion_dttm
,add.create_dttm
,add.requested_completion_dt
,add.reason_cd
,add.completion_cd
,add.dnis_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.service_address_id
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,special_request_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request.del, parms=' || special_request_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_special_request a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.special_request_id = del.special_request_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request.del');

END del;

END da_special_request;
